Author: eyjafjallafuckyall
Text: I’m actually the opposite in a sense. Every time my mom yells (also often, she fits a lot of the criteria of a narcissist as well :( ), I find myself loosing all of my appetite. I can’t eat after my mom yells, even if it’s not at me. I kind of want to just make myself as small as possible so I don’t become a target of her yelling, if that makes sense?
